room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Green Bay Escape in Green Bay
review: I was part of a group of 4 that completed the Asylum room. The experience was amazing with a great mix of puzzles that all tied together very well, unexpected happenings, and super friendly staff that seemed to really care about escape games as a whole and making sure that the group had a great time while doing the puzzles. I can't wait to go back again and see what else they can come up with!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Green Bay Escape in Green Bay
review: First time doing this and we did Asylum! The guys who run the place were so sweet to my fiance. He was hesitant to do it with us because of the confined space so they brought him in to see the room and get comfortable with it. Then they let him join our group free of charge!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Green Bay Escape in Green Bay
review: We escaped from the Asylum last night with 4 minutes remaining. Lots of fun and hope to come back to try another room. Thanks Andrew for your help!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Green Bay Escape in Green Bay
review: Had an awesome time tonight escaping the Asylum room to celebrate my sister's birthday! Jim was great at explaining everything for us first timers and I can't wait to try the Christmas room this holiday season!

room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by Green Bay Escape in Green Bay
review: It was great! I was the only one that had done any kind of escape room out of the 7 of us. Puzzles were challenging but we managed to escape the Asylum! Jim our leader was awesome! We will for sure be back to try to escape the other rooms!
